department.dept_long_name: Department of the History of Science

course.title: Communities of Knowledge: Science, Religion, and Culture in Medieval Europe and the Lands of Islam
course.faculty_text: Katharine Park and Ahmed Ragab (Divinity School)
course.description: Explores the development of scientific ideas and practices in Europe, North Africa, and the Middle East, focusing on the circulation of texts, people, and objects. Special attention to intellectual, social, and institutional contexts.
course.notes: Offered jointly with the Divinity School as 3340.
